name: progress pride hot pad
notes:
this pattern will teach you how to make a pot holder in the shape and colors of the progress pride rainbow flag

techniques used include crochet thermal stitch, in-line color changes, and tucking loose yarn into the rows rather than weaving them in at the end

the pattern includes 40+ full pages of instructions and step by step pictures

yarn should be heat-resistant and not synthetic. i recommend 100% cotton

the finished product will be roughly 8" wide by 6" tall

free version
if you don't need the detailed walkthrough, the basic pattern is posted in the pictures on the left. i want to see these everywhere!
